name: The Rivington Console
description: With its striking colour combination and unique design, the Rivington Console Table is the perfect blend of elegance and glamour. Suited to contemporary spaces, the Rivington Console Table could add elegance to your entry hall or dining room. This unique, modern console brings a sense of minimalism with its geometric almond-shaped pedestals highlighting the beauty of the satin Sycamore Silk top in contrast with the sleek curves of the pedestals.
